author: Universal Pictures
description:
Amanda (Cameron Diaz) unexpectedly shows up at Graham’s (Jude Law) house to surprise him, only to discover that he is a widowed single father to two young girls. 

Buy/Rent The Holiday!  
Prime Video: https://www.primevideo.com/detail/The-Holiday/0O6ZAB6P2OCG8ZFBCOFPHX1HX3
Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Holiday-Cameron-Diaz/dp/B000OBYLVO
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VMq3G0G_lnk
Apple TV: https://tv.apple.com/ca/movie/the-holiday/umc.cmc.7cvz0zhobwyu9102plo1nzwc2

Amanda lives in LA and is a movie trailer editor. Iris lives in Surrey and is a journalist. The two decide to swap houses for two weeks at Christmas - both trying to forget their troubled love lives, until love finds them anyways.

© 2006 Universal Studios. All Rights Reserved.
Cast: Kate Winslet, Cameron Diaz, Jude Law
Produced By: 
Directed By: Nancy Meyers

title: The Holiday | Amanda Meets Graham's Girls (Cameron Diaz, Jude Law)
